ygData.subject: Re: Hmmmm.
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Hi, Cronik. I am Dravith Vandre i, a dark elven shadow knight on the Fennin Ro server. I m currently 34th level. I m in a crested helm (steel plate look),
ygData.messageBody:
> Wake up sleepy heads. :) I know there are more than 6
> people on this list! What are your characters up to? I
> want to hear it. It is boring here at work right now.
> PLZ!
>
> --
> Cronik <Brethren of ill Omen>
> Left Hand of Thule the Pain Bringer
> 11th Season Troll SK
> Bertoxxulous

Hi, Cronik.

I am Dravith Vandre'i, a dark elven shadow knight on the Fennin Ro server.
I'm currently 34th level. I'm in a crested helm (steel plate look), charred
bp (black plate look), steel greaves (soon to be rubicite if they would ever
fix cazic), charred boots (black plate look), steel arms and bracers, and
snakeskin gloves (looks purple). And I use a Dark Reaver. This should give
you an idea of what I look like. I'm in the Sol A/B area a lot trying to get
charred gauntlets to round out my black/steel look (it's the only charred
piece I don't have) and go to B for exp.

I'm just a generally nice guy (especially to lower level SKs). I didn't play
an SK to be "evil," I just liked the powers and abilities of the class. Plus
I like (no, love) being a dark elf, all my characters are inkies. I don't
usually roleplay that much, I just like to have a good time, and I
oftentimes do with my SK. This class really fit me more than any other I've
tried, and I have a hard time playing anything else. I was young once, like
you, and I asked all the same questions you did. Beld (Grant V) was kind
enough to post some very detailed strategies and outlooks that I still use
to this day. If you only get one thing off this list, make sure it's Beld's
advice. Listen to him.

Other than that, don't really have much to say. Being an SK is and always
will be fun to me, and I hope it will be for you as well.

Dravith Vandre'i
Dark Elven SK (34)
Fennin Ro
